Articles.Content:
KSP 0.1.0.0.20892

Windows 11 Pro

Ryzen 7 5700X

RTX 2070

DDR4-3600 16GB*2

Language: Japanese

When I tried to set the E key in the key binding, the mini tab of the key binding ended and I could not set it. This bug occurred everywhere.

Tested on `Windows 10 Pro` and `Linux mint 20.2` and got the same results on both

  • App ID 95485
  • Steam Build ID 10624168
  • Installed 25 Feb

I was able to map all bindings to 'Q'

I was not able to bind some to 'E'

Before the EVA title most worked except:

  • Pitch
  • Yaw
  • Role
  • Translate X
  • Translate Y
  • Translate Z

After the EVA title most did not work except:

  • Run
  • Jump
  • Reset Part Orientation
  • toggleFrameOfReference
  • selectAllPrimaryAssembly
